attributes.action: stop aiding America in the war on Terrorism, as they also pose a threat and cannot be trusted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: America has too many accidents with British troops with friendly fire issues. We cannot trust Americans anymore, and they are showing no gratitude and pushing Britian around. For their ungratefulness, untrustworthyness and insults, I call upon you to stop aiding the American led war, and fight in our own defence or pull out altogether.
